Interactive song labelling

You can use this app to explore and label the vocal repertoire of an individual animal or a population. Hover the mouse cursor over a point in the acoustic space to see its corresponding spectrogram.

Use the lasso () tool to select multiple points at once. | ⇧+ CLICK to select multiple points one by one | ⇧+ to make multiple lasso selections.
